command:
. "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/webpreview.sh" html_header "${TM_FILENAME}" cd "$TM_DIRECTORY" FN=$(echo "${TM_FILENAME}" | sed 's/\.go$//g') if [ -z "$GOOS" ]; then export GOOS=darwin; fi if [ -z "$GOARCH" ]; then if [ "$(sysctl -n hw.cpu64bit_capable)" = 1 ]; then export GOARCH=amd64 else export GOARCH=386 fi fi N=6 if [ $GOARCH = "386" ]; then N=8; fi if [ -z "$GOROOT" ]; then if [ -d "$HOME/go" ]; then export GOROOT="$HOME/go" elif [ -d "$HOME/src/go" ]; then export GOROOT="$HOME/src/go" fi fi echo '

Compiling, linking and running ('$GOARCH')..

' ${N}g -o ".$FN.${N}" "$TM_FILENAME" ${N}l -o ".$FN.${N}-out" ".$FN.${N}" ./".$FN.${N}-out" | pre rm -f ".$FN.${N}" ".$FN.${N}-out" html_footer
name: Compile & Run Single File
